definition: to suspend/to hang up/to hang a person
a string of 100 cash (arch.)/to lament/to condole with/variant of 吊[diao4]
car/vehicle/CL:輛|辆[liang4]/machine/to shape with a lathe/Kangxi radical 159
(coll.) lowest-ranking (student, participant etc)/to rank at the bottom of the list/to finish last

sentences.english: They built a crane capable of lifting 150 tons.
sentences.chinese: 他们造了一台能吊起150吨重量的吊车。

sentences.english: He watches as the crane is loaded onto a truck.
sentences.chinese: 随后他又亲眼看到吊车装到卡车。

sentences.english: When handling loads with cranes or trucks, caution crew members to stand clear of any overhead loads and boom.
sentences.chinese: 用吊车或卡车装卸货物时，货物和起重臂下不许站人。

sentences.english: At the same time, the crane operation efficiency is also a chief reason to effluence on construction progress.
sentences.chinese: 吊车使用效率也是影响施工进度的一个主要原因。

sentences.english: For lifting by crane or other means, please call us for a surcharge.
sentences.chinese: 若需以吊车或其他方式吊运，请来电告知费用另计。

sentences.english: A crane with a flat car for excavator transporting.
sentences.chinese: 十分站内吊车与载运怪手的平车。

sentences.english: Wow, we cannot even build the bridge here, or the crane to assemble it.
sentences.chinese: 哇，我们甚至不会造桥了，或者造桥的吊车。

sentences.english: Has a large indoor pool, owned crane several, stock sufficient inventory.
sentences.chinese: 建有大型室内库，自备吊车数台，现货库存充足。

sentences.english: How much is the maximum lifting capacity in your shipyard?
sentences.chinese: 你厂吊车最大起重量是多少？

sentences.english: The settling coal slime will be cleaned and removed by mud bucket and crane when the settling reaches certain thickness.
sentences.chinese: 沉淀池煤泥沉积一定厚度后由抓泥斗及吊车进行清运。

sentences.english: The dynamic effects of crane movement may also be considered, in part, as lateral load.
sentences.chinese: 吊车活动产生的动力效应也部分地计人侧向荷载。

sentences.english: Under crane's assistance, the bus soars, is moved puts to the road nearby.
sentences.chinese: 在吊车的协助下，大客车腾空而起，被移放到公路旁。

sentences.english: Have the boom pennant wires of port crane re-certified.
sentences.chinese: 重新认证左舷吊车扒杆变幅绳。

sentences.english: The paper investigates the weldability of D36 HSLA steel used for heavy crane beams.
sentences.chinese: 研究了重型吊车梁用D36低合金高强钢的焊接性。

sentences.english: The building of car-dumping machine is a larger-span steel bent frame structure, where bridge crane is erected.
sentences.chinese: 某翻车机房系钢排架结构，设有桥式吊车，跨度较大。

definition: open-topped container (mounted on a truck or cart) for carrying loads/dump box (of a dump truck)/bucket (of a front loader)/wheelbarrow
to construct by hoisting ready-built components into place
